data.title: Getting to Know Hackley
data.text:
Thursdays on the Hilltop: Join us for our Virtual Thursdays on the Hilltop Sessions. Each session covers a particular aspect of life at Hackley. A question and answer session is included.

The Admissions and Financial Aid Application Process at Hackley, Thursday, September 26 at 7:00 PM will feature Sheila Hicks-Rotella, Director of Enrollment Management, Meghan O’Callaghan, Assistant Director of Enrollment Management, and Madeleine Metzler, Director of Financial Aid. They will outline Hackley’s admissions and financial aid application processes and timelines.

All About Upper School, Thursday, October 10 at 7:00 PM will feature Upper School Director, Andy King, faculty members, and students who will speak on the Upper School curriculum, student life, and the 5-Day Boarding program.

All About Middle School, Thursday, October 17 at 7:00 PM will feature Middle School Director, Shazia Durrani, faculty members, and students who will discuss the Middle School curriculum and student life.

All About Lower School, Wednesday, October 30 at 7:00 PM will feature Lower School Director, Lisa Oberstein, faculty members, and parents, who will speak about the Lower School curriculum and student life.

Athletics, Health & Wellness at Hackley, Thursday, November 7 at 7:00 PM will include a virtual tour of the Johnson Center for Health and Wellness, remarks from our Director of Athletics and Chair of Health Education, and an informative panel of coaches and student-athletes.

The Arts at Hackley, Thursday, November 14 at 7:00 PM will feature the Visual Arts Department Chair and the Director of Performing Arts as well as Upper School students who will describe our arts programs and share some of our students' work and performances. Stay logged on to learn about Hackley’s new 50,000-square-foot Center for the Creative Arts and Technology.

Hackley’s K-12 Community, Thursday, November 21 at 7:00 PM will feature remarks by Charles Franklin, Head of School, and Cyndy Jean, Associate Head of School. They and other members of the community will discuss what makes Hackley such a special place.

Campus Tours: We welcome families who have applied to Hackley to attend a student-led tour of our beautiful 285-acre campus. To learn about Hackley’s academic and extracurricular programs in the Lower, Middle, or Upper Schools, visit the Center for Creative Arts and Technology and the Johnson Center for Health and Wellness. Our tours provide an excellent introduction to Hackley.

Lower School Information Sessions and Campus Tours are for parent(s)/guardian(s) only of Lower School Applicants. Middle and Upper School applicants are welcome to join their parent(s)/guardian(s) for the information session and tour. Information Sessions and Campus Tours begin at 9:15 lasting about 60 minutes and will run from October to mid-December. Please log into the admissions portal to see the schedule of available tours.

Open Houses: Join us on campus to learn more about Hackley's Lower, Middle, and Upper School.

Lower School Open House, Saturday, November 16 at 9:00 AM We welcome prospective Hackley Lower School parents to join us on campus. Hear remarks from Charles Franklin, Head of School, and Lisa Oberstein, Lower School Director. Get to know Hackley by meeting our faculty members, parents, and Student Ambassadors. Learn more about teaching and learning at Hackley while exploring the Lower School building.

The Open House will include classroom presentations and opportunities to explore our beautiful campus, including our 115,000-square-foot Johnson Center for Health and Wellness and 50,000-square-foot Center for Creative Arts and Technology. Sign-in begins at 8:30 am. Please note that this event is for Parents and Guardians only.

Middle School Open House, Saturday, November 16 at 9:00 AM We welcome prospective Hackley Middle School students and parents to join us on campus. Hear remarks from Charles Franklin, Head of School, and Shazia Durrani, Middle School Director. Get to know Hackley by meeting our faculty members, parents, and Student Ambassadors. Learn more about teaching and learning at Hackley while exploring the Middle and Upper Schools.

The Open House will include classroom demonstrations and opportunities to explore our beautiful campus, including our 50,000-square-foot Center for Creative Arts and Technology and 115,000-square-foot Johnson Center for Health and Wellness. Sign-in begins at 8:30 am.
